long_description: With an iron grip and the capacity to fit the largest raised side rails, the Crossroad is the new standard for vehicles with factory-installed rails. Strong, low-profile, rubber-coated steel strap provides custom fit and rail protection. 360deg security features a custom fit with no hot spots; rubber skirt conforms to all rail shapes and sizes. Styling of feet complements all vehicles. Easy to install with the turn of a handle; no tools required. Set of 4.
short_description: With an iron grip and the capacity to fit the largest raised side rails, the Crossroad is the new standard for vehicles with factory-installed rails.
